titleStmt.title: A supplement to the proposals for supplying His Majesty with twelve or fourteen millions of money (or more if required) for the year MDCXCVII, without subscripsions, or raising the present taxes : with a scheme that plainly demonstrates the same / by A.D. of Greys-Inn, Esq., and some others his friends.
